data.name: ANH THẦY NGÔI SAO
data.full_description: Hoàng always dreams of being a pop star but has not encountered luck. So he works as a teacher to make a living. After an incident, Hoàng travels to a faraway island and teaches a special class of only five students. Sensing a troublesome life ahead, Hoàng tries to escape from the island but not succeeds because the students and islanders do everything to keep him stay. When he finally finds a way to blend in, the chance to become a true singer comes, which forces him to make a decision.
data.movie_language: Tiếng Việt với phụ đề Tiếng Anh
data.movie_actress: Huyme, Miu Lê, Đức Thịnh, Minh Chiến, Ngân Chi, Mai Cát Vi, Bảo Phúc, Duy Sinh, Xuân Nghị, Hứa Minh Đạt, Gil Lê
